text: Horst Helmut Hermann Niendorf (28 June 1926 – 17 June 1999) was a German actor and voice actor. He appeared in more than ninety films from 1951 to 1996. ==Selected filmography== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Year ! Title !
